properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 9 at 7:21PM AKST until February 10 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up
to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway.

* WHEN...From 5 AM to 9 PM AKST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 PM AKST MONDAY FOR THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY ABOVE 2500 FEET
